Module fypmsV2
Package controllers

Class ProjectController

java.lang.Object
controllers.ProjectController
public class ProjectController extends Object
This class represents the controller for managing the projects in the system. It provides methods for getting, filtering and manipulating the projects data.

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      public static ArrayList<Project> getAll()
      Returns a list of all the projects in the system.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Project objects

    • getProjectById

      public static Project getProjectById(int projectId)
      Returns a project object for a given project ID.
      Parameters:
      projectId - the ID of the project to retrieve
      Returns:
      a Project object or null if the project is not found

    • getProjectsByStatus

      public static ArrayList<Project> getProjectsByStatus(Project.ProjectStatus status)
      Returns a list of projects that match the specified project status.
      Parameters:
      status - the status to filter projects by
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Project objects

    • getAvailableProjects

      public static ArrayList<Project> getAvailableProjects()
      Returns a list of available projects.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Project objects

    • projectExists

      public static boolean projectExists(int projectId)
      Checks if a project exists in the system.
      Parameters:
      projectId - the ID of the project to check
      Returns:
      true if the project exists, false otherwise

    • projectAvailable

      public static boolean projectAvailable(int projectId)
      Checks if a project is available for selection.
      Parameters:
      projectId - the ID of the project to check
      Returns:
      true if the project is available, false otherwise

    • getProjectByStudentId

      public static Project getProjectByStudentId(String studentId)
      Returns the project object for the given student ID.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student to retrieve the project for
      Returns:
      a Project object or null if the student is not assigned to a project

    • getProjectIdByStudentId

      public static int getProjectIdByStudentId(String studentId)
      Returns the project ID for the given student ID.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student to retrieve the project ID for
      Returns:
      the project ID or -1 if the student is not assigned to a project

    • setProjectStatusById

      public static void setProjectStatusById(int pid, Project.ProjectStatus status)
      Sets the status of a project by its ID.
      Parameters:
      pid - the ID of the project to set the status for
      status - the new status of the project

    • getAuthStudentProject

      public static Project getAuthStudentProject()
      Gets the Project object associated with the currently authenticated student account.
      Returns:
      The Project object associated with the currently authenticated student account, or null if the account does not have an associated project.

    • getAuthSupervisorProjects

      public static ArrayList<Project> getAuthSupervisorProjects()
      Gets a list of Project objects associated with the currently authenticated supervisor account. Throws an exception if the currently authenticated account is not a supervisor.
      Returns:
      A list of Project objects associated with the currently authenticated supervisor account.

    • getProjectsBySupervisorId

      public static ArrayList<Project> getProjectsBySupervisorId(String supervisorId)
      Gets a list of Project objects associated with the given supervisor ID.
      Parameters:
      supervisorId - The ID of the supervisor whose projects to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of Project objects associated with the given supervisor ID.

    • createNewProject

      public static void createNewProject(String title)
      Creates a new Project object with the given title and adds it to the system. If the currently authenticated account is not a supervisor, an exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the new project.

    • updateProjectTitle

      public static boolean updateProjectTitle(int pid, String sid, String newTitle)
      Updates the title of the project with the given ID, subject to certain checks. The title can only be updated by a supervisor whose ID matches the project's supervisor ID.
      Parameters:
      pid - The ID of the project to update.
      sid - The ID of the supervisor attempting to update the project.
      newTitle - The new title for the project.
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise.

    • updateProjectTitleStudent

      public static boolean updateProjectTitleStudent(int pid, String studentid, String newTitle)
      Updates the title of a project owned by the given student.
      Parameters:
      pid - the ID of the project to update
      studentid - the ID of the student who owns the project
      newTitle - the new title to set for the project
      Returns:
      true if the project's title was updated successfully, false otherwise
